originalText.text: Great company. Very responsive team from closing, to draw requests, to funding . Most efficient I have seen on the market. I have closed with other lenders in the past and they take up too much time over frivolous things to close, to release draws, to fund . We are investors here; time is money. Silvan understands this.  Have closed loans with them in less than a week.   No red tape. No headaches . If the deal makes sense and the numbers work, they will make it happen.

originalText.text: We chose Silvan Funding to fund our latest fix & flip project. We were illiquid at the time we wanted to make the investment, due to medical bills that were piling up, and we were denied a loan. We applied for a hard money loan with Silvan Funding and the experience was smooth and really easy. In-depth expertise on real estate from the Silvan staff is also impressive!

originalText.text: I'm a local investor in CT and I used them for one of my first major projects. They got the deal done, very good at communicating, good response time. The company isn't "TOO BIG" with all of the separate departments. I would definitely recommend and use again.

originalText.text: Super easy to work with and efficient! A great team overall to borrow from. Looking forward to more : )
